title: China Solar Giant Warns of Demand Whiplash after Rebate Rollback
description: China’s struggling solar sector faces fresh turbulence as the planned removal of a key export-tax rebate threatens to disrupt demand patterns, according to Longi Green Energy Technology Co.
content: China’s struggling solar sector faces fresh turbulence as the planned removal of a key export-tax rebate threatens to disrupt demand patterns, according to Longi Green Energy Technology Co.
